original_text: And the man departed out of the city from Bethlehemjudah to sojourn where he could find a place: and he came to mount Ephraim to the house of Micah, as he journeyed.
korean_text: 그 사람이 거주할 곳을 찾고자 하여 그 성읍 유다 베들레헴을 떠나 가다가 에브라임 산지로 가서 미가의 집에 이르매

sentences.original_text: out of the city from Bethlehemjudah
to sojourn where he could find a place
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 곳을 찾을 수 있는 곳에 머물기 위해

sentences.original_text: and he came to mount Ephraim
